mapper.select: SELECT *,A.APPROVAL_TYPE_NO AS A_APPROVAL_TYPE_NO, APT.APPROVAL_TYPE_NO AS APT_APPROVAL_TYPE_NO, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT((A.APPROVAL_STATUS_CD),3),A.APPROVAL_STATUS_CD) AS A_CODE_NAME, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT((APT.APPROVAL_TYPE_CD),3),APT.APPROVAL_TYPE_CD) AS APT_CODE_NAME, FN_DEPT_NM(LAST_APPROVER) AS LAST_APPROVER_NAME FROM APPROVAL A INNER JOIN APPROVAL_TYPE APT ON A.APPROVAL_TYPE_NO=APT.APPROVAL_TYPE_NO WHERE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') ORDER BY APPROVAL_NO DESC LIMIT #{startRow},#{lastRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL WHERE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')

SELECT *,A.APPROVAL_TYPE_NO AS A_APPROVAL_TYPE_NO, APT.APPROVAL_TYPE_NO AS APT_APPROVAL_TYPE_NO, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT((A.APPROVAL_STATUS_CD),3),A.APPROVAL_STATUS_CD) AS A_CODE_NAME, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT((APT.APPROVAL_TYPE_CD),3),APT.APPROVAL_TYPE_CD) AS APT_CODE_NAME, FN_DEPT_NM(LAST_APPROVER) AS LAST_APPROVER_NAME FROM APPROVAL A INNER JOIN APPROVAL_TYPE APT ON A.APPROVAL_TYPE_NO=APT.APPROVAL_TYPE_NO WHERE A.APPROVAL_STATUS_CD=#{vo.approvalStatusCd} ORDER BY APPROVAL_NO DESC LIMIT #{pager.startRow},#{pager.lastRow}

SELECT *,A.APPROVAL_TYPE_NO AS A_APPROVAL_TYPE_NO, APT.APPROVAL_TYPE_NO AS APT_APPROVAL_TYPE_NO, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT((A.APPROVAL_STATUS_CD),3),A.APPROVAL_STATUS_CD) AS A_CODE_NAME, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT((APT.APPROVAL_TYPE_CD),3),APT.APPROVAL_TYPE_CD) AS APT_CODE_NAME, FN_DEPT_NM(MID_APPROVER) AS MID_APPROVER_NAME, FN_DEPT_NM(ADD_APPROVER) AS ADD_APPROVER_NAME, FN_DEPT_NM(LAST_APPROVER) AS LAST_APPROVER_NAME FROM APPROVAL A INNER JOIN APPROVAL_TYPE APT ON A.APPROVAL_TYPE_NO=APT.APPROVAL_TYPE_NO WHERE APPROVAL_NO=#{approvalNo}
SELECT *,FN_CODE_NM(LEFT(POSITION_CD,3),POSITION_CD) AS P_CODE_NAME, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT(DEPARTMENT_CD,3),DEPARTMENT_CD) AS D_CODE_NAME FROM HUMAN_RESOURCE HR WHERE HR.DEPARTMENT_CD=#{departmentCd}
mapper.update: UPDATE APPROVAL SET APPROVAL_TITLE=#{approvalTitle},MID_APPROVER=#{midApprover}, ADD_APPROVER=#{addApprover},LAST_APPROVER=#{lastApprover}, APPROVAL_CONTENTS=#{approvalContents}, APPROVAL_TYPE_NO=#{approvalTypeNo}, ADMONITION=#{admonition}, MOD_ID=#{modId},MOD_DATE=NOW(),MOD_MENU=#{modMenu} WHERE APPROVAL_NO=#{approvalNo}

UPDATE APPROVAL SET APPROVAL_STATUS_CD=#{approvalStatusCd},APPROVAL_END_DATE=NOW(), APPROVAL_CHECK_CD=#{approvalCheckCd},ADMONITION=#{admonition}, APPROVAL_CONTENTS=#{approvalContents}, MOD_ID=#{modId},MOD_DATE=NOW(),MOD_MENU=#{modMenu} WHERE APPROVAL_NO=#{approvalNo}
